content:
The commander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Alexander Pavlyuk showed how at the School of snipers one of the training centers of the Land Forces is undergoing training of specialists.

The appropriate rollerpublishedOn the Facebook Commander's page.

According to him, at this school modern weapons, equipped with the latest standards of a training town, a thoughtful program and the most prepared instructors.

"At the school of snipers, one of the training centers of the Land Forces continues to train specialists who will destroy the enemy with surgical accuracy," - said Alexander Pavlyuk.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Sniper of the Armed ForcesHe kissedinto the heart of a Russian officer from a distance of 1800 meters.
